title: Utilita could be banned by Ofgem from taking on new customers due to ‘smart meter failure’
lead: The energy market regulator said the supplier has failed to install SMETS2 meters when it should have done so

title: UK’s woodland cover ‘could double without impacting important habitats’
lead: Northumberland maintains the largest potential of any UK local authority, with 77,000 hectares of woodland, according to new research

title: US awards $35m for development of hydrokinetic turbines
lead: The funding will support 11 projects, which will address remote and utility-scale riverine energy and tidal energy

title: Dogger Bank owners close ‘largest ever’ offshore wind project financing
lead: SSE Renewables and Equinor announced the landmark £5.5bn financial deal for the offshore wind farm in the UK

title: Innovative graphene-biopolymer ‘could render plastic packaging obsolete’
lead: Toraphene notes the innovative new material is biodegradable, compostable and commercially-viable

title: Good Energy calls on consumers to waste less energy on Black Friday
lead: The energy supplier has launched a campaign, asking people to consume less energy and protect the planet from overconsumption

title: BT and Hubbub team up for smart home technology challenge
lead: The Smarter Living Challenge will initially work with 60 households across the UK, looking closely at attitudes, perceptions and behaviours around home energy use

title: Tech giants Apple and Amazon face backlash from MPs for ‘e-waste tsunami’ in the UK
lead: The Environmental Audit Committee says the companies are contributing to 155,000 tonnes of waste electricals ending up in bins every year

title: Almost a fifth of North Sea oil companies ‘expect to make further cuts in their workforce next year’
lead: Almost 22% of oil and gas businesses have reduced their staff by more than 10% during 2020, according to new research

title: Old fishing gear polluting the River Ganges is threatening wildlife, warn researchers
lead: A new study found levels of waste fishing gear are highest near to the mouth of the river in Bangladesh
